semantic_profile: AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) is an open-source framework for defining cloud infrastructure in code. It enables developers to use programming languages to model AWS resources, then deploy them. Common use cases include building serverless applications and complex multi-service architectures.
technical_intent: Infrastructure as code framework for defining and deploying AWS resources in programming languages
description: Aws Cloud Development Kit from AWS.
